name: La Vie La Rue
description:
Jump, Throw And Dock To Make Your Way Around La Vie La Rue World. Nine unique Characters to mess around with in the five colorful unlockable maps such as Longueuil, Montreal and many other cult locations.

Try to unlock as many challenges as possible and get your stats to the highest. This minigame contains six unlockable objects to use against your ennemies who are the pigs, the metro barrier and the police drones. Try to unlock the secret turtle who can move freely in each map without dying.

Easy mode gets you infinite ammo but watch out, Hard mode has only 20 bullets, you won't win so easily.

    FEATURES
  • 5 unique maps that gets more and more difficult
  • 6 different unlockable weapons
  • 9 characters coming from Marchandise's imagination
  • 8 challenges with different difficulties
  • A stats screen in game to see your hishscores
